home.title: I'm a Software Developer/Engineer
home.description: I'm a Software Engineer/Developer with a passion for building web applications and solving problems. I'm currently a student at Lambda School, where I'm learning the skills to become a full-stack web developer. I'm also a graduate of the University of Benin, where I studied Computer Science.

about.description:
I am a software engineer and a tech enthusiast. I love to build things and solve problems. I am currently working as a software engineer at Andela. I am also a co-founder of a startup called Tribe47.
